file_content.text: Excuse me for not shaking hands.
I can reach you from here.
You're close enough to hurt.
Wait! There's a lot you don't know!
Make your final moments count.
Remember the first time you let SCORPIO on my ship? It got me thinking we needed a few modifications...
The Omnicannon, sublight engines, and hyperdrive remain locked down.
I hate playing with broken toys, but you can fix anything.
Koth's encryption key is personal. I need to learn more about him to break it, but I can't access a HoloNet signal through the battle.
You served with him. He must have told you things.
Yes, this is going to hurt.
But there's a hidden passcode behind the main one. No one knows but me. If Vaylin unlocks the bridge controls without it, we're in real trouble.
You ever heard of a quantum bomb?
Oh, Koth. You didn't.
Anyone who doesn't enter that hidden passcode starts a countdown.
Everything for thousands of kilometers around us... boom.
Every time you open your mouth, I gain one more reason to end you.
I'll kill you for this.
You might want to hold off on that.
I came down here to disarm the bomb. Thought you might want to help.
One thing we've always agreed on: Vaylin has to die. Let's be sure.
Partners, for now?
I'll kill you later.
When it's done, you're dead too.
Vaylin's forces control the ship. I'll distract them. Go with Koth.
There's nothing left between us.
I've got bomb fuses hidden on this deck. C'mon.
Sorry, should've knocked.
Why start now?
[Flirt] Nonsense.
When you're quite done, tell us what the hell is going on.
Alliance forces are in danger!
I never figured on losing my ship with me alive--much less our fleet being that close.
You owe me a drink.
Lana...
It's a relief to see you in one piece.
I'm glad you're safe.
I'm used to you barreling through doors like a gundark.
That's not your style.
You'd better have a brilliant way out of this, Vortena.
Start explaining yourself.
I'm not here to fight, Koth. I just want my ship back.
I didn't come to hurt you.
That's far enough, Koth. Keep your hands where I can see them.
Stay back. No sudden moves.
That's fine. You're close enough.
You're still in blaster range.
Let me explain! You need to hear this!
Talk fast.
Tell us what's going on.
I'm not looking for a fight. We've got enough problems.
Told you I could handle myself, but we need to act fast.
Now that we're all here, what the hell is happening?
The situation is what you might call "tricky."
Just when I think you can't get any more senseless...
Koth, you idiot.
You can yell at me all you want later.
You wouldn't set a trap that destructive without an off switch.
There must be a way to stop it.
I'm crazy, not stupid.
You never warned us this was a death trap! Half my fleet is outside!
I never thought it would go down like this. I don't want good people to die.
Partners.
Let's get the Gravestone back.
Fine, but I don't trust you.
This is temporary--and I'll be watching you.
Half our fleet is outside! You should've warned us!
You'll be good to her, right?
Lana means everything to me.
Of course. I love her.
My relationship with Lana is none of your business.
I don't answer to you.
Lana chose me over you. Stings, doesn't it?
You're jealous.
That's all I needed to hear.
I guess that's true.
We were over before you showed up. Doesn't mean you deserve her.
This isn't just about saving the Gravestone. We had something.
I'm here because I care.
I haven't forgotten--but that's not why I called you.
